A

actionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class SnakeGame
Handles actions performed by the game.
App - Class in Unnamed Package
The main class that sets up and starts the Snake game.
App() - Constructor for class App
 

C

collision(Tile, Tile) - Method in class SnakeGame
Checks if two tiles collide (i.e., occupy the same position).

D

draw(Graphics) - Method in class SnakeGame
Draws the game components including the grid, food, obstacles, and snakes.

K

keyPressed(KeyEvent) - Method in class SnakeGame
Handles key press events for controlling the player snake.
keyReleased(KeyEvent) - Method in class SnakeGame
This method is not needed and is left empty.
keyTyped(KeyEvent) - Method in class SnakeGame
This method is not needed and is left empty.

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class App
The main method that initializes the game window and starts the Snake game.
move(Snake) - Method in class SnakeGame
Moves the specified snake and handles interactions such as eating food or colliding with obstacles.

N

new_place() - Method in class SnakeGame
Generates a new random position for the tile, ensuring it does not collide with any obstacles.

P

paintComponent(Graphics) - Method in class SnakeGame
Paints the game components onto the game board.
placeObstacles() - Method in class SnakeGame
Places obstacles randomly on the game board.

S

Snake - Class in Unnamed Package
Represents a snake in the game.
SnakeGame - Class in Unnamed Package
The SnakeGame class is responsible for managing the game state and rendering the game components.

T

Tile - Class in Unnamed Package
Represents a tile in the game grid.
